head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MELLUSI, JOHN J. SR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MELLUSI, JOHN J. SR.

block.p: MELLUSI-John J. Sr. on May 9, 2000. Beloved husband of Anna May. Loving Dad of Bruce, Joyce Stanishich & John Jr. Dear fatherin-law of Caroline, Nick & Debbie. Beloved grandfather. Reposing at Walter B. Cooke-Kennedy, 117 West 72 Street, NYC Thursday & Friday, 2-5 and 7-9PM. Funeral Mass Blessed Sacrament RC Church, Saturday at 10:30AM. Interment St. John's Cemetery.
